  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103126</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103126</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Localiser une image après réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">Locating an image after reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lokalisieren eines Bildes nach Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando uma imagem após a reflexão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione dell'immagine dopo la riflessione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εντόπιση μιας εικόνας μετά από την αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización de una imagen después de la 
reflexión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre que les rayons reflétés, produits par les rayons d'incidence provenant de la gauche du miroir, semblent  être venue d'un point sur la droite du miroir. L'image est  formée à ce moment.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reflected rays, generated by the incident rays from the left of the mirror, appears to have come from a point on the right side of the mirror. The image is formed at this point.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la formation d'image</string>
            <string language="en">image formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons</string>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle reflété</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die reflektierten Strahlen,
festgelegt durch die Ereignisstrahlen vom links des Spiegels, scheint,
von einem Punkt auf der rechten Seite des Spiegels gekommen zu sein. 
Das Bild wird an diesem Punkt gebildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os raios refletidos, 
gerados pelos raios do incident da esquerda do espelho, parece ter 
vindo de um ponto no lado direito do espelho. A imagem é dada 
forma neste momento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i raggi riflessi, 
generati dai raggi di avvenimento dalla parte di sinistra dello 
specchio, sembra venire da un punto dalla parte di destra dello 
specchio. L'immagine è formata a questo punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει απεικονισμένος οι 
ακτίνας, παραγμένος από συναφής ακτίνα από αριστερό καθρέφτης,
εμφανίζεται να έχει προερχόμενος από σημείο σωστός πλευρά 
καθρέφτης. Η εικόνα διαμορφώνεται σε αυτό το σημείο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los rayos reflejados, 
generados por los rayos del incidente de la izquierda del espejo, 
aparece haber venido de una punta en el derecho del espejo. La 
imagen se forma a este punto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildanordnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">formação da imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo refletido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo riflesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχηματισμός εικόνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία επίπτωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απεικονισμένη γωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">formación de la imagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
